mapper.select: SELECT u.user_name, md.department_name, GROUP_CONCAT(mt.treatment_name) AS treatments FROM users u JOIN doctors d ON u.user_no = d.doctor_user_no JOIN medical_department md ON d.department = md.department_no JOIN medical_treatment mt ON FIND_IN_SET(mt.treatment_no, d.treatment) > 0 WHERE u.admin = 1 GROUP BY u.user_name, md.department_name;
